Message_Enter_Company_Bin: Enter BIN / IIN of the company
Message_Enter_Company_Bin_Min: BIN / IIN of the Company must contain at least the following number of characters:
Message_Enter_Company_Bin_Max: BIN / IIN of the Company should not exceed the following number of characters:
Message_Enter_Company_Head: The full name of the head of the enterprise must contain at least the following number of letters:
Message_Enter_Company_Phone: Enter the company phone number starting from +7
Message_Enter_Company_Email: Enter your company email in the correct format
Name: Name
Title: Title
Source_Materials: The list and name of the starting materials from which the waste was formed
Site_HasBeenCreated: The export site has been created
Site_HasBeenUpdated: The site has been successfully updated
Utilizator_HasBeenUpdated: The disposal site has been successfully updated
Message_Recycling_Type_Title: Enter the Recommended Waste Treatment Method
Message_SiteTitle: Enter the name of the export site
Message_TransporterTitle: enter the name of the carrier
Message_Utilizator_Title: Enter the name of the disposal site
Precaution_Title: Precautions to be taken when handling waste
Message_Precaution_Title: Enter the Necessary Precautions for Waste Handling
Transportation_Requirements_Title: Requirement for waste transportation and loading and unloading operations
Emergency_Requirements_Title: Measures to prevent and eliminate natural and man-made emergencies and their consequences
Message_Phone_Transporter: Enter the contact number of the carrier
Message_Phone_Utilizator: Enter the contact number of the disposal site
NoUtilizators: No disposal sites have been created yet
Instruction_Line1: This system allows you to maintain an electronic register of enterprise waste for automatic generation of reports.
Instruction_Line2: Click on the link ''Waste passport'' and fill in the required fields for each passport of waste of your enterprise. The line ''Limit'' indicates the maximum mass of waste according to the agreement.
Instruction_Line3: Follow the link ''Transporters'' and fill in the data of the carrier.
Instruction_Line4: Then follow the link ''Disposal sites'' and fill out the details of the company that utilizes or recycles your waste.
Instruction_Line5: The system is ready for use, and you can start filling out the waste register using the link ''New entry'' - select the name of the waste, transporter, place of disposal and fill in the remaining fields.
Instruction_Line6: After saving the record, you can see the results by clicking on the links ''History'' and ''Limits''.
Waste_Source: The list and name of the source materials from which waste was generated
Waste_Hazard_Property: List of hazardous properties of waste
Waste_Chemical_Composition: The chemical composition of the waste and a description of the hazardous properties of its components:
Waste_Index_Source_Document: The document from which the characteristic is taken
Details_Comment: More information in the file to upload
Waste_Name_And_UOM: Name of the waste and unit of measurement
Message_Waste_Aggregate_State: Check the Aggregate state of waste
